title: Kissing Carmen
description: How many ways can you kiss and be kissed within 24 hours of meeting a new lover? How can two people know if they are destined to be together when they’ve known each other less than a day? When Carmen and Rick meet on a rainy summer night in Madrid, they begin a whirlwind romance that sweeps them to the heights of ecstasy.Forced to confront their respective pasts and weigh the possibility of spending the rest of their lives together, Rick begs Carmen to come to Paris with him for the weekend.Can they build on the passion between them to see if their newly-blossomed love is more than just the excitement of a one-night stand? Will Carmen, still not sure of Rick’s intentions, commit herself physically, emotionally, and spiritually to her newly-found lover? Or will she treat her time with Rick as a short-term fling, rapturous and fun, but nothing more…
author: Stephen Colwell
